replies.body: Ok, I might be a bit rocky with my puns but it's nothing to gravel about. I haven't played her but most people who do are rather stone cold after the game, though there are a few that make people quake in their boots and win by a landslide...... I wonder if she lives on a Plateau. Ech. Seems I've really hit rock bottom with the jokes. Please don't give me the cold boulder, i was on a roll {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
hope i dont get stoned for this comment but this champ rocks
ROCK SOLID MALPHITE IS HARD FOR NEW CHAMP {{champion:54}} {{summoner:32}}

I think there shoud be a story mode for Taliyah
that whoud be so cool.{{champion:22}}
taliyah is not very good she has really bad ap scaling{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Looks like there's going to be a landslide of Taliya play this patch...
